nodes.bodyText: Before merging this in and removing the Storage account creation for EventHubs could you double check that Checkpoint Store doesn't use it at all. I know it is built to use Storage Blobs to store checkpointing data, if there are no integration tests than this can be completely removed.
Yes. We do not have any integration tests for Checkpoint store. It seems wasteful to create something that is unused at the moment. If we add some in, we can do a git fl and resurface the code.
